# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/vexflow`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for VexFlow (http://vexflow.com).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/vexflow.
